text:
@PMOIndia @narendramodi Not received any financial support or any other help from central or state governments in ongoing Lockdown, you have no rights to lock us  forever, coronavirus is not going in coming days and vaccine is far away so please lift nationwide Lockdown & Give exit plan
#nomorelockdown https://t.co/bLiJuOiejy

domain.name: Political Body

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
